name: WebCams
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: web cams
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using your Alexa Display Device, such as Echo Show or Echo Spot, you can now instantly view over 12,000 publicly available webcams from around the world!

Just say the name of the city, state, country, or location you want to see. For example, you can say:
- New York City
- Korea
- Eiffel Tower
- Egypt
- Australia
- Antarctica
- Airport
- Great Wall of China
- Niagara Falls
- Stadium
- Beach

Or say "Random" to see a random one! 

You cay say "SlideShow" to see a slideshow of random web cams, which is really fun!

Best of all, if there is a webcam you really like, you can say "Set Favorite" to mark that webcam as your favorite. Then each time you start the skill or say "Show my Favorite" it will show that webcam and even periodically update it on your screen!

All images are continually being updated, so you always see the most recent, newest one on your Echo device screen, along with its exact location. And, Alexa will tell you the name of the location as well as how recently the image was taken. 

It's amazingly enjoyable and even a bit addictive, to watch these images from all around the world!!

Note: Occasionally a webcam will be down and show a blank image - try again a few hours later and typically it is back up again.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
